Legal_Issue: Failure to consider all grounds of refugee claim under sections 96 and 97 of IRPA
Application_Facts: Board only considered internal flight alternative; did not address Amazigh ethnicity or political opinions despite evidence of threats and deteriorating conditions in Libya
Decision_Outcome: Breach of procedural fairness found; IFA analysis deemed unreasonable
Court_Ruling: Case remitted to the Board for reconsideration
Defendant_Behavior: Board failed to analyze all relevant grounds of claim
Grounds_for_Claim: Persecution based on Amazigh ethnicity and political opinion expressed online
Legal_Standard: Must analyze all relevant grounds for a refugee claim under s. 96 (persecution) and s. 97 (personal risk) of IRPA
Assessment_Factor: Ethnicity, political opinion, internal flight alternative, country conditions in Libya
Procedural_Issue: Failure to provide procedural fairness in assessment
Evidence_Used: Evidence of threats, online political expressions, ethnic heritage, deteriorating conditions in Libya
Application_Basis: Risk of persecution due to membership in particular social group (Amazigh) and political opinion
Evidence_Assessed: Threats, online activity, ethnic identity, country condition reports
Relief_Sought: Recognition as refugee, protection from return to Libya
Governing_Rule: Board must assess all grounds of a refugee claim including those under s. 96 and s. 97
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Failure to consider evidence related to ethnicity and political opinion
Harm_Assessment: Risk of persecution in Libya due to Amazigh ethnicity and political opinion
Cause_Description: Ajelal feared persecution in Libya due to his Amazigh ethnicity and political opinions expressed online
Evidence_Handling: Insufficient consideration of key evidence by the Board
Evidence_Issues: Relevant evidence on ethnicity and political opinion not adequately addressed
Evidence_Assessment: Incomplete assessment of evidence supporting persecution claims
Decision_Rationale: Board's decision was procedurally unfair and unreasonably limited to internal flight alternative without evaluating other risks
Evidentiary_Issues: Omission of critical evidence regarding ethnic and political risk factors
Legal_Standard_Applied: Procedural fairness, reasonableness standard in judicial review
